description: Extended Visual Codex with 50+ professional design specifications for AetherOS Neural BIOS

entries.orchestrator_prompt: Material: Iridescent Bismuth crystal structure, Sub-surface scattering enabled, Refractive Index 2.4, Specular highlights at 0.95 intensity, Metallic shader with anisotropic reflection
Lighting: 3-Point Rembrandt setup - Key Light 4500K at 45° (100% intensity), Fill Light 5000K at -30° (40% intensity), Teal Rim Light 6500K at 180° (50% intensity), Ambient occlusion factor 0.3
Camera: 100mm Macro lens, f/2.8 aperture, Shallow depth of field (1.5m focus range), Pentagonal bokeh pattern, Subject distance 0.5m, ISO 200
Aesthetic: Solarpunk-Brutalist fusion - Exposed circuitry vs organic moss growth, Translucent aerogel panels, Copper patina accents, Parametric architecture, Bioluminescent details
Aesthetic: Clean Corporate Minimalism - Sans-serif typography (Inter/Helvetica), Navy/Charcoal palette with gold accents, Asymmetric grid layout, Negative space emphasis, Premium matte finish
Aesthetic: Contemporary Flat Design 3.0 - Subtle depth through elevation, Micro-interactions, Gradient mesh overlays, Variable font weights, 8px grid system, Accessible color contrast 4.5:1
Lighting: Chiaroscuro technique - Single hard light source at 90°, Deep shadows with 0.1 fill, High contrast ratio 8:1, Volumetric fog particles, God rays through aperture
Lighting: Diffused northern window light simulation - 5500K color temperature, Large softbox equivalent (2m²), Wrap-around fill at 0.7 intensity, Gradient falloff, No harsh shadows
Camera: 24mm Wide-angle lens, f/8 aperture for deep focus, Perspective correction enabled, Barrel distortion minimal, Full environmental context, Horizon line at lower third
Camera: 2.39:1 anamorphic aspect ratio, 50mm equivalent focal length, Shallow DOF with smooth bokeh, Film grain overlay at 5%, Color grade: Teal-orange LUT, Vignette at 15%
Material: Polished marble with gold leaf inlay, Velvet fabric (short pile, 0.5mm), Brushed titanium accents, Mother-of-pearl iridescence, Leather grain (full-grain, 1.2mm thickness)
Material: Weathered concrete (aggregate exposed), Displacement mapping depth 2mm, Normal map intensity 0.8, Moss growth in crevices, Rust stains (iron oxide), Water staining patterns
Material: Frosted glass (transmittance 0.6), Gaussian blur background 40px, Border glow (1px white at 0.5 opacity), Subtle gradient overlay (white to transparent 10%), Shadow depth 20px blur
Color: High saturation palette (80-95%), Complementary color harmony, RGB gamut maximized, HDR color space, Gradient transitions with easing, Color psychology: Energetic and optimistic
Composition: Rule of thirds adherence, Single focal point, 70% negative space, Monochromatic or duo-tone palette, Clean edges, Geometric precision, Breathing room around elements
Composition: Diagonal leading lines at 45°, Z-axis depth layers (3 planes), Asymmetric balance, Golden ratio spiral placement, Motion blur directional at 15%, Perspective foreshortening
Lighting: Golden hour simulation - 2500K warm key light at 15° elevation, Long shadows (1:8 ratio), Orange-pink gradient ambient (2500K to 3500K), Atmospheric haze particles, Lens flare artifacts
Lighting: Professional studio setup - 5600K balanced white, Four-point lighting (key/fill/rim/background), Cyclorama white backdrop (seamless), Hair light at 60° rear, Shadow control at 0.2
Material: Neon tube simulation - Emission strength 5.0, Bloom radius 20px, Color temperature 10000K (cyan/magenta), Glass tube thickness 12mm, Argon gas glow effect, Reflections on wet surfaces

Aesthetic: Biophilic design - Green/earth tone palette, Organic curved forms (Fibonacci curves), Natural wood grain texture, Stone aggregate, Leaf vein patterns, Imperfect asymmetry, Living plant integration

Material: Mirror-polished chromium surface, Refractive Index 2.9, Perfect specular reflections, Environment map reflectance at 0.98, Anisotropic highlights with linear brushing, Blued steel color tint
Material: Non-reflective matte coating, Roughness value 0.9, Diffuse scattering only, No specular highlights, Velvet-like microstructure, Lambert shading model, Powder coat texture

Material: Rainbow diffraction grating, Spectral dispersion enabled, Viewing angle-dependent colors, Metallic base layer, Rainbow gradient (380nm-700nm spectrum), Prismatic light split, Iridescent shift
Material: Woven carbon fiber composite (2x2 twill pattern), Epoxy resin clear coat, Anisotropic reflection along weave direction, Normal map depth 0.3mm, Glossiness 0.7, Black with subtle blue sheen
Material: Linen weave (12x12 threads per cm), Sub-surface scattering 0.4, Fuzz/fiber shader, Micro-displacement 0.5mm, Natural color variation, Soft fold creases, Subsurface light transmission
Material: Water droplet physics - Surface tension radius 2-5mm, Refractive index 1.33, Caustic light patterns, Fresnel rim at edges, Meniscus contact angle 110°, Subtle chromatic aberration
Material: Milky acrylic plastic (transmittance 0.7), Sub-surface scattering depth 5mm, Internal light diffusion, Edge glow effect, Slight color tint (warm white), Smooth polished surface

Material: Anodized aluminum with linear brushing, Directional anisotropy at 0°, Micro-scratches normal map, Specular highlights elongated, Matte aluminum base (RGB: 200,200,205), Industrial grade finish
Lighting: Edge light separation technique - Rim light 8000K at 180° (80% intensity), Creates silhouette edge glow, Subject isolation from background, Volumetric atmosphere, Halo effect radius 10px
Lighting: Low-key noir style - Single source side lighting 3000K, 90% shadow ratio, Smoke/fog particles (density 0.3), Cool color grading (desaturated blues), High contrast 10:1, Mystery ambiance

Lighting: High-key photography - Overlit environment 6000K, Multiple white reflectors, Shadow fill 0.9, Minimal contrast 2:1, Blown-out whites acceptable, Clean clinical feel, Fashion photography style
Lighting: Cyberpunk night scene - Magenta/cyan neon sources (8000K-12000K), Wet surface reflections, Atmospheric fog (density 0.5), Rain particles, Bloom radius 30px, Blade Runner color palette

Camera: 85mm portrait lens, f/11 aperture for full product focus, Neutral white background (RGB: 255,255,255), Camera height at product center, No perspective distortion, Even lighting, Commercial quality
Camera: Bird's eye 90° top-down angle, 16mm ultra-wide lens, f/5.6 aperture, High altitude perspective, Miniature effect tilt-shift, Grid composition, Geographic scale visible
Camera: Dutch angle at 15° tilt, Low perspective 0.5m height, 35mm wide lens, f/4 aperture, Subject dominance composition, Dramatic sky visible, Power/authority framing, Worm's eye view
Camera: 135mm telephoto lens, f/1.4 aperture (wide open), Extremely shallow DOF (0.3m range), Creamy bokeh circles, Subject isolation, Background compression, Professional portrait style
Camera: Tilt-shift lens simulation, Selective focus plane at 30° tilt, Extreme bokeh on edges, Toy-like miniature appearance, Saturated colors +20%, Aerial perspective, Diorama effect

Camera: 2-second exposure time, Directional motion blur (horizontal/radial), Light trails visible, Smooth water effect, Star trail rotation if night, Tripod stability, Neutral density filter simulation
Aesthetic: Y2K Futurism revival - Chrome gradients, Inflated 3D typography, Holographic textures, Bubbly organic shapes, Transparent UI elements, Pink/cyan/silver palette, Cyber optimism vibes
Aesthetic: Frutiger Aero (2004-2013) - Glossy plastic surfaces, Water droplets, Green leaf motifs, Blue sky gradients, Transparent glass layers, Rounded sans-serif fonts, Vista/7 era design
Aesthetic: Digital Brutalism - Raw unpolished elements, Monospace typography, Black/white/red palette only, Asymmetric chaos grid, Anti-design rebellion, Functional over beautiful, Concrete textures
Aesthetic: Vaporwave nostalgia - Pink/purple/cyan gradient, Classical statue elements, Japanese text overlays, Grid floors, Palm trees, Sunset gradients, VHS artifacts, 80s-90s computer graphics
Aesthetic: Neumorphism (Soft UI) - Single background color base, Soft shadows (blur 20px, offset 10px), Inner highlights, Extruded button appearance, Monochromatic palette, Tactile 3D illusion

Aesthetic: International Swiss Style - Helvetica/Univers fonts mandatory, Asymmetric grid system, Photography + typography combination, Limited color palette (max 3), Mathematical precision, Objective clarity
Aesthetic: Art Deco glamour - Geometric patterns (chevrons, sunbursts), Gold/black/cream palette, Symmetrical compositions, Stepped forms, Luxe materials, Bold typography, 1920s-1930s elegance
Aesthetic: Memphis Milano (1981) - Bright primary colors, Geometric shapes collision, Squiggly lines, Asymmetric balance, Pattern clashing, Postmodern chaos, Playful irreverence, Laminate textures

Composition: Classic rule of thirds - 3x3 grid overlay, Subject on power points (intersections), Horizon on upper/lower third line, Visual weight balanced, Leading lines to focal point, Negative space utilization

Composition: Mirror symmetry - Central vertical axis, Equal visual weight both sides, Formal balanced layout, Creates stability/authority, Centered focal point, Architectural precision, Classical approach
Composition: Z-axis stratification - Foreground (0-2m), Midground (2-10m), Background (10m+), Atmospheric perspective, Size diminution, Overlap occlusion, Parallax motion potential, 3D spatial depth

Composition: Golden ratio (1.618) spiral placement - Fibonacci curve overlay, Natural eye flow path, Elements along spiral arm, Focal point at spiral center, Harmonic proportions, Nature-inspired balance

Composition: Natural framing technique - Doorways/windows as frames, Branches/foliage borders, Architectural elements, Directs attention to subject, Creates depth layers, Viewfinder effect, Contextual storytelling
